Package StarFighter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Locatable
    Interface for Locatable objects containing methods to set and get the position of an object
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Alien
    Extends MovingThing to create a moving Alien object to oppose the Ship object
    Ammo
    Extends MovingThing to create a bullet starting from the ship and moving upward into an Alien or off the screen
    MovingThing
    Implements Locatable to create a class which sets initial position and direction of movement of a MovingThing
    OuterSpace
    Extends Canvas to paint the display with a black background and paint moving aliens, ammo, and the ship onto it
    Ship
    Extends MovingThing to create a Ship object to oppose the Alien object
    Shiptest
    Runs Ship to test accuracy.
    StarFighter
    Runs StarFighter through a new method called StarFighter that instantiates a new OuterSpace.
